name: React
its_paragraph: Brilliant replaces lecture videos with hands-on, interactive lessons. It’s a better (and more fun) way to learn. Build confidence with hands-on learning. You'll get to see concepts visually, interact with key ideas, and solve challenging problems that get you to really think. All of our courses are crafted by award-winning teachers, researchers, and professionals from MIT, Caltech, Duke, Microsoft, Google, and more.
